name: Rising Storm 2: Vietnam - Specialist Pack Cosmetic DLC
detailed_description:
Stand out on the battlefield - or rather, don’t. This cosmetic DLC pack contains everything you need to look and feel like a bona fide special forces operator in the jungles of Vietnam, even if your army won’t let you BE one! Contains items for both the Northern forces and for the US.

US Forces:
  • US MACVSOG uniform
  • US Green Bandana
  • US Alternate Camo Paint 'Tattoo'

Northern Forces:
  • VN Sapper Shorts
  • VN Jungle Operations Cap
  • VN Grease and Ash Body cover 'Tattoo'

short_description: Stand out on the battlefield - or rather, don’t. This cosmetic DLC pack contains everything you need to look and feel like a bona fide special forces operator in the jungles of Vietnam, even if your army won’t let you BE one! Contains items for both the Northern forces and for the US.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.5GHz or AMD Phenom @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or ATI Radeon HD 5850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: UNSUPPORTED HARDWARE: 32-bit Operating Systems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.2GHz or AMD @ 4.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD R9 270X or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
